Seventy artefacts were damaged when looters broke into the world-famous Egyptian Museum, on the edge of Tahrir Square, focal point of an uprising against President Hosni Mubarak 's regime. Restoration has started on the items, including on a statue of King Tutankhamun and a statute of King Akhenaten, Zahi Hawass told AFP.
